resources:
Party Order
_initialized_ I/O error Could not connect to host. System message:
%1$s Undo Initializing… Lost connection to internal service. Not supposed to happen. Maybe clearing some memory will help. Careful! No way out Rename Fatal error Could not bind to internal 'adventuring' structures. This is required to prevent data loss when you turn your phone (and other technicalities).
This should be a transient problem. Too fast. Try again.
Ready. Your friends can connect. Could not publish the group to wi-fi. Your friends can still connect but only using explicit connections. Show connection infos Looks like someone is connected. If you continue, I will have to stop communicating.

Do you want to go back to main menu? Interrupt operations Failed to get an handle to the party creation service. This is required to work so I'll just stop there and no nothing. Try again, maybe after a reboot. Failed to get an handle to the party adventuring service. This is required to work so I'll just stop there and no nothing. Try again, maybe after a reboot.
I cannot create the "heroes gather here" service. There's nothing I can do about it.
(Error %1$s) Looks like Network Service Discovery is unavailable. I require this thing to let your friends join the party. Connect %1$s
 This does not look like a valid port number. Ports are usually between 1024 and 65535. Try again. Unable to connect to the specified host. Make sure you're specifying a valid host and the host is reachable ('thethering' will help). Try again. Failed to parse server reply. This server is incompatible. Server replied in an unexpected way. This server is incompatible. Version: %1$d (%2$s) Options: matching group protocol is more recent, please update this installation group protocol is obsolete, please update party owner installation Joining group To join a group, write a message to party owner. You must do that at least once. Send Wait until party owner confirms you being in the group. Device %1$d, connected from %2$s said: Tap to let in group Reject %1$d silent %2$s connected. %1$d %2$s talked, showing below. Probing, please wait… Gathering party "%1$s" Failed to get network information. This isn't really a problem but you'll have to find this device network address in some other way in case your friends need explicit connection data. "An error occurred while attempting to start accepting connections. I suggest to start again, possibly after rebooting device." A device tried to connect to the group but something went wrong in the process. Lost connection to device managing characters %1$s. Lost connection to device, last words: %1$s Connection to server lost or closed unexpectedly. Server is running protocol %1$d but client requires %2$d.
Please update %3$s device. this party owner Cannot start network discovery. Error %1$s. Message to join Send %1$d / %2$d "Error detected while attempting to send message to party owner. Details: " Empty messages are forbidden. Message too long. It might be displayed partially or not at all. Go back and fit the given budget. / Hide device? Further interaction with the device will be silenced. This operation cannot currently be reverted but client can quit and join again at any time. Hide Group member! Disconnected from a party before I could identify it. Disconnected from group %1$s (hosted at %2$s). Name Initiative Creator Character name Health points Initiative bonus Send At least one failed .writeSync calls. Could not switch to playing character definition mode. I suggest starting from scratch. Details:
%1$s Experience Defining characters Accepted! Refuse Accept Tick Character accepted. Party owner just tried to redefine key for the active group. This is very odd and might result in malfunctions. You were accepted in some other group than the one you're on already. I'll just ignore this, carry on. Try to join a single group next time (in doubt, try explicit connection) Add another character Must have a name. Health points must be positive.
 Health points must be a number.
 Level must be positive.
 Level must be a number.
 Initiative must be a number.
 Experience must be at least 0.
 Experience points must be a number.
 Not a valid character Go back and try again. Failed to send character data to party owner, detailed error follows:
 Players can now define playing characters. They can define more than one for each device part of the group.
Their characters will appear below. Sent. Waiting reply. Bad character: experience must be positive. Bad character: health points must be at least 1. Bad character: must have a name. Bad character: level must be at least 1. Start a new session Make party Very bad error Could not build party key. This is based on internal machinery which was supposed to be here by the standard, something is very wrong. File exists but cannot be read. This is unlikely to happen by accident so you're better check your system is fine. Data archive exceeds maximum size. group version 0 should have never been saved. Group %1$d clashes with %2$d, both are named "%3$s". Group key %1$d clashes with %2$d, both are named "%3$s" and have the same key! failed to output data serialization, that was not supposed to happen and needs further investigation. could not get an output stream to save new group definitions. This was not supposed to happen. Failed to write new group definitions. Maybe you are just low on storage? Group [%1$d]%2$s : missing name. : missing key. : missing party definition data. File cannot be read. read size mismatched. party definition data playing characters NPC : empty list. : missing name. : level is 0. : empty. " statistics" , device[%1$s]: not enough salt. : invalid creation timestamp. : no session file specified. Cannot save new data. Old data refused to go away. Oh no! New data was successfully produced and stored but couldn't be given its real name and old data is already gone!
File:
 %1$s Found two actors with the same ID. Inconsistent initiative order: expected %1$d, available %2$d Inconsistent initiative arrays, mismatched sizes. Actor at least twice in a round. Actor got an initiative but it should not be fighting! Unknown fighing actor!
Failed to load already existing data. New data will not be saved to preserve previous contents. Details: %1$s Success! Data successfully saved to internal storage. Do you want to go adventuring right away? Main menu Could not store new group data. Error: %1$s failed to delete previous contents, new data will be discarded to maintain the old. Failed to rename new data to override old. Old data storage has been destroyed but data itself is preserved. Level Searching for parties. Found parties will appear below. Joining a new party Send a message to a party to join. The message will be displayed only to party owner to identify you. Cannot find your party? Try an explicit connection! You will advance to next step automatically as soon as the party is formed. Explicit connection Give up and go back Initializing… Network discovery failed to start. You can still join a group by attempting an explicit connection. Lost connection to group "%1$s", reason given: %2$s. Lost handle over the cross-activity data sharing service. This is required to work. Party name:
Initiate explicit connection Could not connect to specified device. Check your input is correct and the device is reachable: it must be on the same Wi-Fi network! Not sure? Try using "tethering". I found a party named "%1$s" here but it is not accepting new players. You might have to talk to your friend about this. The information you need here can be found at the bottom of the screen on party owner device. Port Network address Could not send HELLO to host. System message:
%1$s Connected.
Failed to load owned party data. This is required for the app to function. Ignoring this will only make the problem worse so the app will now close. Exit app Loaded party owner data is version %1$d. Current version is %2$d so data should be upgraded but no upgrading is possible yet. Continue at your own risk. Loaded client data is version %1$d. Current version is %2$d so data should be upgraded but no upgrading is possible yet. Continue at your own risk. Inconsistent party data loaded. You can proceed at your own risk making the problem worse. List of errors:%1$s Assemble a new party Join a new party Additionally, %1$d exception(s) were thrown while disposing of the communication channels. Impossible It seems I had to go with a newly created party but I couldn't match it. This is a very serious error.%1$s Exit Pick a party… Party manager Could not build digest to verify device identity. This was not supposed to happen and it's very serious. Try rebooting. Could not set up the server. Try again after clearing some memory. Failed to initialize cryptographic data digest structures. This was not supposed to happen!

This is required for stuff to work so app will now close. Impossible, monster data exceeding maximum size. Impossible, failed asset read. Loading data… Quit
Bad party name Every party needs a name.
Your friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve. A party with the same name already exists. Names must be unique. Modify party name Device selection Give your new party a name. Party name Publish party on Wi-Fi Connected devices will be listed below. Select the devices to let in the group. Data for explicit connection:
Port: %1$d
%2$s Publish Cannot open communication so your friend's devices can connect. This is very serious and prevents anything from working. Define playing characters An error occurred while connecting a new device. Maybe the network is broken or I am low on resources. Consider restarting. Lost connection to whoever sent the message "%1$s". You can ignore this issue. Sealing a group There is a single device in the group. There are %1$d devices in the group. %1$s This operation cannot be reverted. Once you go ahead adding more players will require to restart. Go define characters Failed to generate secret key for new party. Something is very wrong with this system. Try rebooting. At least one connected device couldn't get in the party. Continue anyway Discard Waiting for a party name. Waiting devices to talk… Unknown device %1$s Device "%1$s" hidden. Manage hidden devices Set new name Rename Set name Set characters budget
Players are defining characters. Failed to signal character "%1$s", error: %2$s Save party which defined 1 character which defined %1$d characters Lost connection to device "%1$s" %2$s. You can continue ignoring some errors, the group will still be formed and the device can later join anyway. Save party to storage We're almost done. Check all the playing characters are defined and accepted. Save party data Saving party… Yes Save Undergoing I/O. Try again later. Approve PCs
Propose PCs Define as many characters as you want. The process will complete when party owner decides so. Add a character Lost connection to party owner device. This is a fatal error and cannot be currently recovered. If you already proposed your characters the party owner might be able to make it anyway, otherwise you'll have to start from scratch. Back to main menu Done! Party successfully formed. I will now save some data and take you back to main menu. Go adventuring Party owner is starting a new session right away! See you there! Party creation completed.%1$s Character "%1$s" was rejected. You can modify something and retry. Done
Owned party icon Owned parties Parties generated and stored on this device. You have full control and you can host games.
Joined party icon Joined parties This device holds a key allowing you to join games as a player. Created: Last played: Currently: Currently: Last played:
", " No party selected. Tap on a party overview to show information and actions here. Created: Created: Last played: Status: New session Continue last session Continue battle Assisting %1$s Last played: Key received: Go adventuring Keep adventuring Keep fighting Played: %1$s Pick a party Party details Deleted "%1$s" I am rewriting storage data so I cannot let you go away. By the time you have read this, I've hopefully finished. Recover successful Restore deleted Restore Errors detected in session data. In the future I might be able to fix this but for the time being there's nothing I can do. To protect the data, I will now take you back to main menu. Give up and go main menu Failed to get input stream. never fighting adventuring nothing going on Inconsistent data!
Gathering heroes Welcoming players… Identified devices Unassigned characters Could not publish service. Explicit connections are still available. Cannot stop publishing. Odd. Perhaps trying again will fix that. Publishing stopped (explicit connections still available). Manage PC from this device Select an unused character to manage it from this device in case the player is missing a session. Failed to register network service:
%1$s Start session All playing characters assigned to a device. Ready to go. A client tried to connect but I couldn't serve the request. This is really bad and I would expect more stuff to go awry at this point. Perhaps rebooting will help. Please upgrade app on this device. Please ask your friend to upgrade app. Device "%1$s" connected running version %2$d.
You're running version %3$d.
It is strongly suggested all devices to run the same protocol version.
%4$s No playing characters on this device. Whoops! Something went wrong while giving out session data. This is very wrong and state is now likely inconsistent. Please report this issue.
Connection informations Port: %1$s Port is valid for all addresses. Network addresses Try only one at time already active internal error max limit reached unknown error Classes and levels
Join party Initializing… Party join status Options: %1$s Attempt join Looks like I have a key for this one. Looking for party You will advance to character selection as soon as I can connect to the master device. Error while joining group %1$s: %2$s Pulling character data from known server… Cannot explore network. You must use an explicit connection. Exploring Wi-Fi… Found a party there but it is still being formed. I'm ignoring it. Found party "%1$s" there. It is not the one we're looking for. I suggest to forget about this party but if you want I can try to join anyway (I'll most likely fail). Attempt join Found a party, but it is not being formed. Discarding. Found a party but master wants to verify key and I don't know what to do. Discarding. Incoherent code, unknown enumerated value for playing character list type. Character selection Here is a list of all available characters. Tap a character to manage it from this device. Assigned to this device You can swipe those away to give up a character. They will not be deleted. Available Tap to request the master to assign those to you. A character ownership request has been refused. %1$d character ownership requests have been refused. A character previously assigned to you has been given to someone else. %1$d characters assigned to you have been taken away.
Character image Character image HP max: %1$d Level: %1$d XP: %1$d Tap to play here One character played on another device. %1$d characters played elsewhere. Requested to play here. Requested to be played on this device Character "%1$s" assigned to player "%2$s". Player "%3$s" just requested the same character. What shall I do? Ignore new request Prefer new player Your ownership change request for "%1$s" was refused. Character "%1$s" taken away. Character "%1$s" will be played on another device. The party is now playing, but looks like you have been given no characters! Nothing to do. Main menu Failed to get an handle to the party maintenance service. This is required to work so I'll just stop there and no nothing. Try again, maybe after a reboot. Play session over network. Lost connection to the party maintenance service. This was not supposed to happen. Please report this! One character has not been assigned to any device. %1$d characters have not been assigned to any device. %1$s
To continue, all characters must be played by someone.

Go back and long press an unassigned character for some options. Play on this device
Group member Forming new party. RPG order management RPG party creation Port not currently open.
No connections available. Hidden devices are listed below. You can restore them to view or disconnect them. Both operations require care! Disconnect Restore Rename device New name Names must have at least one character. Device names are visible only from this device. Set message budget Messages exceeding this length will not be shown.
Playing characters have their separate budget.
A lone adventurer %1$d playing characters Level %1$d Levels %1$d - %2$d Missing session file. session file takes %1$d, maximum size allowed is %2$d
Actor pic
Adventuring Select everyone taking part in next battle. PC MOB NPC \??? Started brand new session. Restored from %1$s. At least one playing character required. Add mobs to battle Search mobs to battle Ignore and start battle Someone will not take part to battle. Is that what you intended?
Initial surprise round can be managed later. Initiative! Waiting initiative rolls I will switch to battle as soon as I can figure out an order of initiative.
For the time being, you must wait. Could not save session data.
Details: %1$s
Spawn monsters Searching… Show monster book information Monster info Add monsters to battle Add monsters Found a single monster. Matched %1$d monsters. %1$s (%2$d)
Monster book informations Created: Entries: Monsters total: !!! Unknown publisher !!! !!! Invalid publisher !!! (3rd party)
"CR %1$d" CR %1$d/%2$d Initiative: Tap to battle Spawncount to battle: %1$s !! Unknown ACTION_CLIMB token !! !! ACTION_CLIMB param array bad size !! tree !! Unknown conditional initiative action !! climbing %1$d if %2$s %3$s %1$s, %2$s %1$s, %2$s
Wyrmling Very Young Young Juvenile Young Adult Adult Mature Adult Old Very Old Ancient Wyrm Great Wyrm Small Medium Large Huge Greater Elder fine diminutive tiny small medium large huge gargantuan colossal
Fight! Actors with no check will skip round.
Use this for surprise rounds! Round %1$d %1$s has a readied action. You can renew the prepared action or discard it. Renew prepared action and go next Discard and act Not fighting yet!
Initiative order as below. Actor by player. NOTE: Hit point tracking is TODO so you'll have to disable defeated mobs manually. Finish battle and distribute XP End battle Done? There's no going back! Battle order and monster status will be discarded. Distribute XP You can suspend battle or simply discard. If you discard you won't distribute XPs. Neither case rolls back battle effects. Discard Suspend for later
Not much you can do here for the time being, maybe something more interesting in the future.
Just do what you want, roll what you want and then pass turn to next. End your turn Act now! After you: Pass round to next player Next Next to act: %1$s Round %1$d Delay action Ready action
Delay Delay action Move up in order Move down in order Apply Ready Action Optional condition description. Apply I cannot let you do that. You have been given a turn to play, you will act. You can get out only by passing turn.
Prepared action Errors detected in getting data from master device. Giving up. Failed sending data request.
Hanging around… Fighting! Waiting master device. Failed to connect to adventuring service. This is required to prevent data loss.
This is hopefully a transient error. Try rebooting your device. Adventuring Fetching data from master device… Waiting for battle start. Confirm Roll for Initiative! Just roll dice and enter result.
Modifier (%1$s) applied automatically. Please wait while master gives battle order.
I will go away ASAP. Waiting sequence Waiting other players to roll. Waiting turn.
Device will vibrate when your attention is required. One does not simply get outta there. You are connected to master device, if you go away stuff might go awry for other players. Quit game %1$s received %2$d XPs
current XP %3$d
Distribute XP Select the monsters to compute their XP awards. Selected: %1$s, total XP: %2$d Now select the PCs receiving experience. Selected: %1$s> %1$d XP each all If you go back, you will throw away XPs. The proper way to do that is to consume all monsters. Discard
